amendment.description: To increase funding for guaranteed broadband loans, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2117 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2117 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S14128-14131; text: CR S14128) To increase funding for guaranteed broadband loans, with an offset.
